item.description:
To Purchase Tickets - Go HERE
We had a great time last year!

The Cape Cod Baseball League All-Star Game is returning to Fenway Park.

The contest will take place on July 28 at 7:05 p.m. ET, and prior to that there will be a home run derby, an autograph session and a silent auction with baseball memorabilia, a Red Sox-issued news release announced on Thursday.

Fans can purchase tickets, which cost $10 for general admission, at redsox.com/capecod. Discounted concession items will be available during the game.

This year will mark the Cape Cod League's 46th All-Star Game in its "modern era," and the 23rd using the present format of East Division versus West Division. Last year's game at Fenway drew 14,317 fans.

"Each summer the Cape Cod League All-Star Game is our premier showcase event," Cape Cod League president Judy Scarafile said in a statement. "It is eagerly anticipated by everyone connected with the league, especially our players and our many fans. Having it take place at Fenway, America's most beloved ballpark, is only fitting as we celebrate the 126th year of Cape Cod baseball. Last year's event at Fenway, in spite of inclement weather, was a huge success. We are thrilled to be returning." FULL STORY
item.name: Cape Cod League all Star Game - $10/tix
